document.full_text: a grand jury in texas indicted tampa bay buccaneers cb aqib talib on charges of aggravated assault with a deadly weapon on friday.
document.title: grand jury indicts bucs' aqib talib for alleged assault
lines_and_colors: a grand jury in texas indicted tampa bay buccaneers cb aqib talib on charges of aggravated assault with a deadly weapon on friday.
